TopicTitle: Getting 502 Bad Gateway While looking around Forums.

Articles.Content: I don't know where to post this, but for some reason today I have been getting the 502 Bad Gateway problem while I'm just looking around the forums. Is this just me or are other people having this issue? I wasn't getting this problem yesterday if that helps.

Getting LOADS of them today, yes. :-(

Join the gang = http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84869-502-Error-Ocurrance-List
While trying to get to this post to check on it I had a ton of them. I fear a follow up to the April 2013 forums derp is imminent.

While trying to get to this post to check on it I had a ton of them. I fear a follow up to the April 2013 forums derp is imminent.

Nothing of the sorts

The 502 error indicates that the forum server cannot handle the load it's receiving, meaning it drops requests. It does not indicate a loss of data

Nothing of the sorts

The 502 error indicates that the forum server cannot handle the load it's receiving, meaning it drops requests. It does not indicate a loss of data

So, too much "requests"?

If yes, that woud make sense.

Nothing of the sorts

The 502 error indicates that the forum server cannot handle the load it's receiving, meaning it drops requests. It does not indicate a loss of data

Alright. Thanks for the info. I wonder how the server could suddenly receive such a large load. Either way it seems the forums are back to normal now.

Alright. Thanks for the info. I wonder how the server could suddenly receive such a large load. Either way it seems the forums are back to normal now.

You jinxed it
